meanings.definition: An antibiotic used to treat serious bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed vancomycin to fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: Vancomycin is commonly used in hospitals to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were scared of the vancomycin coming to defeat them.
meanings.sent4: Vancomycin acted like a brave knight, battling the bacteria invaders.
meanings.sent5: The vancomycin marched into the body, ready to wage war against the harmful bacteria.

meanings.definition: A medication that works by stopping the growth of bacteria.
meanings.sent1: The vancomycin halted the bacteria from multiplying further.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often rely on vancomycin to prevent bacteria from spreading.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were surprised when the vancomycin put a stop to their party.
meanings.sent4: Vancomycin was like a strict teacher, putting an end to the bacteria's growth spurt.
meanings.sent5: The vancomycin acted like a traffic cop, directing the bacteria to a dead-end road.
